parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns true if the specified unit is subgroup leader.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isFormationLeader''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - Unit being checked.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if unit is subgroup leader.

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_isLeader = [[isFormationLeader]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[commandFollow]], [[doFollow]], [[formationLeader]], [[formLeader]], [[leader]], [[selectLeader]], [[setLeader]]
</value></part></template>
